root: ^Well, hello there! Welcome to Gay-fe! The all inclusive place to hang where you can be truly yourself!

InitialChoices: ^Yeah, before that, I want to ask about the lights in here real quick.
^I'd just like some coffee, thank you!
^Nothing much, just wanted a place to rest if I'm being honest
Lighting: ^Oh yes, I finally had the oppurtunity to set the lights to my liking today! Do you like them?
^Yes, I think they look really pretty!
PrettyLights: ^Thank you so much! What do you like about them?
^The colour scheme is just so darn good!
^No particular reason, they just look really good!
BackToIntro: ^Well, thank you very much! It really means a lot to me that you like them!
DontLikeTheLights: ^Oh I see. Why might that be?
^I'm not really a fan of neon kinda lights to be honest, but they aren't ugly or anything
IndifferentLights: ^Oh okay. Well, thank you, I guess.

c-0: ^So, anything that brings you here other than the lights?

BadEnd: ^Well, thank you for your input. I was about to close the cafe. The door's right there! Thanks for coming in!
CupOfCoffee: ^Sure thing! What kind of coffe would you like?
HotCoco: ^Great choice, and we do have it! Feel free to have a look around, I'll place it on the table and ring you when it's ready!

c-0: ^Oh don't worry, it's on the house tonight! It's my last day!
^Ohh okay. Well, thank you so much, and I hope you have a great night!
^Thank you, your order will be ready in just a short bit!

TakeAwayCup: ^Great choice, and we do have it! Feel free to have a look around, I'll place it on the table and ring you when it's ready!

c-0: ^Oh don't worry, it's on the house tonight! It's my last day!
^Ohh okay. Well, thank you so much, and I hope you have a great night!
^Thank you, your order will be ready in just a short bit!

JustChat: ^Ohh okay, you're welcome to do so! So, how's your day going?
^It went great, thanks! What about you?
^It went ehh. Kind of like everyday I guess lol. What about you?
^It hasn't been that good to be honest...
GreatDay: ^I'm really  glad to hear that! My day went quite good as well, thank you for asking!
^Oh, I'm really glad it went well!

c-0: ^Haha, thank you! I'm really sorry to cut the conversation short, but I really need to close the cafe now. I've alread been here longer than I should have.
^Oh, no problem! It was great fun talking to you!

AverageDay: ^Oh I see. Yeah, mine was mundane too. Same old same old, yknow.

c-0: ^Yeah. But I think these mundane days make life exciting.

^You see, if every day was filled with rush and stuff, then after a while, the rush itself becomes mundane, and then you're back in a mundane life. Without mundane days, you would never know what exciting days feel like.
^Mother Mary whispering wordse of wisdom, I see?
^Anyways, I need to shut down the cafe now. But it was great talking to you! I hope you have a great night!
^It was a blast! Thanks for teaching me a thing or two, o wise one! Gnight

BadDay: ^Oh, I'm really sorry to hear that. Do you want to talk about it?
^I mean, it's okay. That would mean letting my burdens weigh on you, and that I just can't do
^Not really. There's nothing to talk about, to be honest.
NoThankYou: ^You seem like a wise person. I really hope whatever is bothering you gets figured out soon. You deserve some happiness!
^Aww, thank you so much! You're too kind!

c-0: ^Haha, no, not really. I'm just doing what everyone should.
^Yeah, but still. You don't have to.
^Yeah, I know. But I should, because this is how I'd want other to treat me as well.
^Do unto others as you would have them do unto you.
^Right. Anywhoo, I gotta close the cafe now since it's pretty late, or early I guess.
^All right, it was really gund talking to you! Have a great night!
^Thank you, and pleasure's all mine! Good night!

NothingToTalkAbout: ^Ahh I see. I hope it gets better

c-0: ^Anyways, I should leave now. Have a great night!
^Thank you, I was just about to close the cafe. Gnight!
